import { ExitToApp } from '@material-ui/icons' import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import SearchBlock from '../SearchBlock/SearchBlock' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Topbar.css' import Status from '../Status/Status' import Modal from "../Templates/Modal/Modal"; export default function Topbar() { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')) const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState("") const [allUsers, setAllUsers] = useState([]) const [findUsers, setFindUsers] = useState([]) const [isBlock, setIsBlock] = useState(false) const [modalActive, setModalActive] = useState(false) const [modalMain, setModalMain] = useState(false) const [isFetching, setIsFetching] = useState(false) // выход const logOut = () => { localStorage.clear() window.location.reload() window.location.href = '/' } // получение всех пользователей. отключено useEffect((e) => { const fetchUser = async () => { const res = await axios.get('/api/user/') setAllUsers(res.data) } fetchUser() }, []) // поиск пользователя. отключено const handleKeyPress = (e) => { if(e.key === 'Enter'){ setFindUsers(allUsers.filter(user => user.user_name.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase()))) setIsBlock(true) } } const handleClick =()=>{ setFindUsers(allUsers.filter(user => user.user_name.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase()))) setIsBlock(true) } return (
{/* {
setSearchValue(e.target.value)} onKeyPress={handleKeyPress} placeholder='Найти...' className="searchInput" />
}*/}
Главная cтраница
{user.username}
Информация
setSearchValue(e.target.value)} type="search" name="" placeholder="поиск" className="input"/> setSearchValue(e.target.value)} type="submit" value="" className="submit"/>
{isBlock ?

Найдено: {findUsers.length}

{findUsers.map((user) => )}
: <> }
) }
